name: MEMBAZ Jersey
description: Elevate your game with our exclusive branded jersey top, designed for peak performance and style. Crafted from high-quality, breathable fabric, this jersey ensures comfort and durability whether you're on the field or cheering from the stands. Featuring a sleek design with vibrant colors that won't fade, our jersey is a testament to both your team spirit and your commitment to quality. Complete with a signature elastic band for a snug fit, it's the perfect addition to any fan's collection.

name: MEMBAZ Heads in the Cloud (Front) Tee
description: Slip into a cloud of comfort and make a bold statement with our vibrant, eye-catching prints that speak to your unique style. This shirt isn't just a piece of clothing, it's a companion for your adventures, ready to collect stories and memories.

name: MEMBAZ Long Sleeve Tee
description: Wrap your arms in the cozy embrace of our premium long sleeve! It's like a hug from a cloud — only better, because it's stylish too. Crafted from the whispers of a thousand cotton balls, this shirt promises to be your wardrobe's new best friend. Whether you're braving a breezy boardroom or just chilling on a casual Friday, it's the perfect companion. And with its ability to make you look effortlessly chic, it's practically a superhero in shirt form!

name: MEMBAZ Cap
description: MEMBAZ trucker hats, known for their distinctive design featuring a foam front panel perfect for custom branding and a breathable mesh back for comfort. These hats offer a blend of style and practicality, making them a favorite for outdoor activities and fashion statements.

name: MEMBAZ Male Tank-Top
description: Crafted for the modern man, this tank top is where comfort meets style. Made with premium, breathable fabric, it's perfect for a sunny day out or a casual evening with friends. The sleek cut highlights the physique, while the soft material ensures you stay cool as a cucumber, no matter the heat

name: MEMBAZ Female Tank-Top
description: Elevate your style with our chic crop tops, perfect for any occasion. From casual day-outs to glamorous evenings, our versatile range offers a perfect blend of comfort and fashion. Pair them with high-waisted jeans or a sleek skirt to create a statement look that's all your own.
